title: Almond and Chocolate Chip Biscotti
ingredients: ['220g blanched whole almonds', '250g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '175g caster sugar', '335g dark chocolate chips', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons whisky']
